attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This is definitely not a good app to download, very glitchy

attributes.title: Poor quality
attributes.review: This app just stole my information and gave it to Russia 0 out of 5

attributes.title: Crash
attributes.review: This app is plain awful. What a joke. I’d rather have the coronavirus than ever have to look at this stupid app again!

attributes.title: I was hacked
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to keep up with POTUS, and on the same day my phone was hacked into. I had my bank info in my phone and my account was drained. I will no longer have this app and I will stay updated through twitter.

attributes.title: That’s cool and all not really but
attributes.userName: its a me that one guy
attributes.review: Gru is the most powerful being in the universe and here’s why: he is 4 minions tall which means he is a godly size of 14 feet tall. Furthermore if you remember in the original despicable me, you know there is a scene where Vector kidnaps the three girls and shoots a series of heat seeking missiles at Gru and and then proceeds to dodge all of them. According to speed of an average ballistic missile (1900 mph) and the size of the missile according to his ankle size, He can perceive and move at such a speed. After this he punches a shark and it’s paralyzed it’s spine is probably broken and it requires a force greater than 3,000 newtons to fracture the spine. That’s equal to the impact created by a 500 pound car crashing into a wall at 30 mph

attributes.title: I’ve never been more suicidal
attributes.review: This app has led me to put a gun in my mouth. I was never confident in this country, but at least I was secure. After downloading this app, I found myself wanting to eat a bullet even more than I wanted to during my emo years. As a woman, I feel there is no point living anymore. Trump desires to take away my right to choose, my right to birth control, and my right to equal pay. For my LGBTQ+ friends, trump wants to make discriminatory health care legal based on sexuality and gender. For my POC friends, trump wants you arrested for BS so you can perform unpaid labor (aka slavery). This app undid six years of therapy and put me back on suicide watch (not that trump supporters believe in mental health).

attributes.title: read this 🤠
attributes.review: when i was on the app my dog, turning 365 at the time, was extremely irritated. he said in morse code with his barks “what a shrimp🍤 laughing cat😹 and cheese🧀”. he then proceeded to eat my phone, requiring me to buy a new one with is what i’m writing this on. definitely a 1 star app and will never download again.
